name: Highway Madness
description:
Welcome to Highway Madness, a virtual reality arena where you choose to play two different types of active multiplayer games: RUN and SHOOT!RunAs the name implies, you run across highway stretches, picking up power-ups and avoiding incoming cars, with one goal in mind: to make it to the finish line first!Features
- Enter into the game lobby, select from a list of characters available and meet new players!
- There are 3 rounds to each Highway Madness game!
- Highway Madness can also be played as single player, putting you head to head with bots!
- Arm-swinging locomotion – intuitive movement system adding to the thrills of this game!
- Variety of power-ups scattered across the highway for you to pick-up before someone else does!
Jumping – giving you a lead over your opponents
Shooting – to slow down nearby players!
Speed Booster – to get you running faster and get you closer to the finish line!
Lightening – to strike opponents nearest to you!ShootIn shoot, you are pitted against other players in a setting that is the combination of a fun Wild Wild West meets Electric Fighting Cage. In SHOOT, pick up weapons and throw shots at each other! Each gunshot you hit your opponent with propels him further up in the sky so keep shooting until he/she reaches the electric lines and is out!! There are plenty of items in this arena to help you take cover!May the Best Player Win!
